title: Wealth in the U.S. - UHNW ( super rich ) population in 2014 , by city
summary: The Wealth U.S. State in the super rich was State Los_Angeles , who made 8655 Ultra-High-Net-Worth .
The most U.S. State was Washington , with just 1095 Ultra-High-Net-Worth .

In second place was State San_Francisco with 5460 Ultra-High-Net-Worth ; third place went to State New_York with 8655 Ultra-High-Net-Worth ; fourth place went to State Seattle with 1095 Ultra-High-Net-Worth and fifth place went to State Chicago , who was 2885 Ultra-High-Net-Worth .
gold: This statistic shows the number of the super-rich , or Ultra-High-Net-Worth , persons in the United States in 2014 , sorted by city . New York has the largest concentration of super-rich individuals ; about 8,655 UHNW ( Ultra High Net Worth ) people are living in the metro area .
